Attached are 2 documents related to your question. The first document pertains to software being used by Wayne County, MI. The second document is a case study of Peoria, AZ of solutions implemented to cut down fleet costs. I hope this helps.

author: [Anonymous]
text:
How does a better organized fleet system help save money on parts, repairs and improve the longevity of each vehicle? And how much money can be saved?
All of our city vehicles are worked on/maintained and fueled at an inhouse city owned shop (oil changes, tires, brakes, general maintenance). I'm looking for information on a Fleet Management System that will help us track inventory, fuel usage, maintenance schedules, and retirement schedules. GPS tracking is not necessary. I'm also hoping to obtain research on Fleet Management Systems that include data.
title: Fleet Maintenance Software
